text: Solidarity can refer to: * Solidarity (Polish trade union), a Polish trade union originally led by Lech Wałęsa; * Solidarity, a United States political party from the fusion of the International Socialists, Socialist Unity, and Workers' Power; * Solidarity, a newspaper published by the Alliance for Workers Liberty in the UK. * Solidarity = feeling of unity based on respect, support, equality, common values, welcoming actions, diversity, community, etc.
title: Solidarity
